componentDescription: Displays various loading animations with optional text positioning for user feedback.

children.description: Optional children prop to pass React nodes inside the Loader component.

loaderColor.description: Optional prop to define the color of the loader element.

type.description: Defines the type of the loader based on the LoaderType enum.

textColor.description: Optional prop for setting the color of the text displayed with the loader.

textPosition.description: Determines the position of the text relative to the loader from the TextPosition enum.

size.description: Sets the size of the loader, which can be a specific pixel number or a standard Size enum.

speed.description: Controls the speed of the loader's animation, using the values from the Speed enum.
